tool.name: Primer Search
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/primer_search.py -o $output #if str($error) -e $error #end if #if str($min) -m $min #end if #if str($max) -M $max #end if #if $keep -k #end if #if $remove -r #end if $forward $reverse $database 2> $logfile

param.name: forward
param.label: Forward primer sequence
param.help: DNA sequence, letters corresponding to multiple nucleotide allowed

param.name: reverse
param.label: Reverse primer sequence
param.help: DNA sequence, letters corresponding to multiple nucleotide allowed

param.name: error
param.label: Maximun error allowed on match
param.help: Number of mismatch allowed for each primer

param.name: min
param.label: Min len amplicon size
param.help: Only amplicon with this minimun length were reported

param.name: max
param.label: Max len amplicon size
param.help: Only amplicon with this maximun length were reported

param.name: keep
param.label: If set, Keep description instead of report PCR position

param.name: remove
param.label: If set, remove primer sequance from reported amplicons

tool.help:
**What it does**
Search primer on database and return amplicons on fasta format.
